item.description: Often there's a delicate line, well maybe more like battle lines, between feeding your kids healthy foods and just getting them to eat anything at all. But never fear--it is possible to make healthy meals (one per night that is) the whole family will eat while at the same time helping your kids open up to and enjoy a variety of foods. Come learn how to change your meal routine for the better and maybe find out your picky eater isn't doing as badly as you think. Guest Speaker: Heidi McIndoo, MS RD LDN, Nutrition Writer, Food & Nutrition Expert, and Spokesperson.
item.name: How to Raise Healthy Eaters (and Stop being a Short-Order Cook at Dinner)
